intro: Glamour and firepower collide in this thrilling special forces shooter! Stylish action meets stunning visuals in this character-focused TPS that will captivate you!
description:
The elite special forces unit "Bang Bang Girls" has been assembled to save the world from the international terrorist organization "Moe Pink". Former fashion model Seira and professional dancer Arina—these strikingly beautiful operatives—will overwhelm enemies with their charisma and firepower. Immerse yourself in the dazzling graphics delivered by toon-shaded animation visuals and fall for the charm of these captivating characters!

・Raid terrorist hideouts threatening the world while completing thrilling missions.
・Collect Seira and Arina's glamorous costume collection with gold earned from clearing stages.
・Unlock exciting Defense Mode mini-games when you break through specific stages.
・Lead the defense through 10 intense waves in Defense Mode to unlock exclusive special illustrations!
・Enjoy collected costumes from any angle with the free 360-degree Character Viewer Mode.
・Zoom, rotate, and examine acquired costumes from your preferred perspective.
・Touch characters to trigger lively reactions and dynamic responses with special interactive features.
・Maximize immersion in an animation-like world realized through cartoon rendering technology!

Dangerous special agents in action-packed shootouts! Glamorous Seira and captivating Arina showcase a dazzling costume collection, bonus Defense Mode mini-games, and an immersive Character Viewing Mode! The definitive visual-focused TPS combining charm and firepower! Download "Bang Bang Girls: Moe Panic" and save the world with the special forces team!

Prologue
The international female terrorist organization "Moe Pink" threatens the entire world. This organization consists solely of attractive and dangerous operatives, occupying government agencies and critical facilities across nations while attempting to create their own world. The government has secretly devised countermeasures. Codename "Bang Bang Project"—creating a special forces unit composed of the world's most devastatingly beautiful operatives.

Seira is a former fashion model whose captivating poses alone command everyone's attention. Arina is a professional dancer from a prestigious dance academy whose flexible movements and mesmerizing choreography disorient enemies. "We must save the world with our charm and the hostages too!" Seira applied crimson lip gloss while gazing at her alluring reflection. "Time to show them we're the best!" Arina smiled while donning her form-fitting combat uniform.

The two operatives have now become the "Bang Bang Girls," engaging in spectacular and deadly gunfights against armed operatives while simultaneously rescuing precious hostages. The world's most dangerous and beautiful battle begins now!
